string-array.name: gambling_tips
string-array.item: Don\'t ever spend more money or time than you can afford on gambling.
If you lose interest in usual activities or hobbies because of gambling, seek help.
Never aim to chase losses or huge wins, if this is the case please seek help at begambleaware.org
Does gambling make you feel anxious, worried, guilty, depressed or irritable? Seek help at begambleaware.org
Do you feel you need to gamble with larger amounts of money to get the same feeling of buzz? You may need help, seek it at begambleaware.org
Do you go to extreme methods to find money to gamble? Seek help.
Do you find that you\'re tempted in every day life to gamble? You may have a problem. Please seek help at begambleaware.org
Poker originated and was developed in Louisiana, USA.
The 52 card deck was not introduced to Poker until 1834, with the game being played with only 20 cards prior to this.
On Aug 2, 1876, Wild Bill Hickok was shot and killed during a poker game. The hand he was holding was allegedly Ac, As, 8c, 8s, forever known as the dead man\'s hand.
You are 6% likely to be dealt a pocket pair in a game of Texas Hold\'em.
Having a suited hand only improves your odds of winning a hand by 2.5%
The chance of one of your hole cards making a pair on the flop is 32.43%
The chance of flopping a flush with two suited hole cards is only 0.8%
When two pairs go all in before the flop, the bigger pair will win 80% of the time.
